titleStmt.title: Reasons against the rendering of our sworne and subscribed confession of faith
titleStmt.author: Warriston, Archibald Johnston, Lord, 1611-1663.

notesStmt.note: By Archibald Johnston, Lord Warriston. Erroneously attributed to Alexander Henderson.
In this edition C2r line 1 has: prelats.
Probably intended to be issued with STC 22026, but often found bound with STC 22030, 22056, and other items (STC).
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.
